display_long_description:
Zombie Hell VR takes you back for a ride in hell once again, this time round with full immersive VR tech.

:. Story .:
The city is a dead town. Zombies are everywhere, almost everyone you know is dead, but at least you still have your guns with you. Will you survive Zombie Hell once again?

:. Snappy Gunplay .:
The original excitement of firing an actual weapon has been retained. Gunshots are snappy, and each shots connect beautifully. Weapon models has also being enhanced to look better. It's a hell of a gun time.

:. Beautiful Levels .:
Improvements in game engine allow creation of more beautiful scenery containing impressive effects and lightings. Each episode bring you to a new environment filled with suspense.

:. Hell of a Problem .:
A hell of a problem, more creatures emerge from all around the desolated landscapes to torment you, from acid spitters to tough looking zombies packing strong punches!

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/LuandunGames/
http://www.luandungames.com
